about_the_game:
Animations Select is a series of premium animation asset packs designed to provide game designers with flexible and affordable options to upgrade specific areas of their projects. Unlike "Animations Collection", the focus of each "Animations Select" is much narrower; the former provides breadth, the latter provides depth.

"Animations Select - Light" features 10 stunning effect animations revolving around the pack's theme. Dazzle your audience and let them see their champions' might in a new light!

Features:

* 2 casting animations.
* 6 skill animations.
* 2 full-screen skill animations.
* Contains effekseer files for use with RPG Maker MZ

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

This pack contains effekseer files which will only work in RPG Maker MZ, they will not work in any other RPG Maker engines.
